resources.string: Having entered the Old Town through the Cracow Gate (Brama Krakowska), stop and turn right, next to the first house on the corner of Bramowa and Jezuicka Streets. The Lublin Tourist and Cultural Information Centre is a place where you can get maps, guides and promotional brochures regarding the City of Lublin and the Lublin region, as well as purchase exciting souvenirs. Employees of the Centre will be happy to inform you about current events and tourist attractions, municipal and regional transport, and they will help you find suitable accommodation, as well as suggest a place for a good dinner. You can rent a bike here and leave your luggage. You can also use a computer with internet access.
